title: Valentines Day Kitten
description: When Marcie's silver kitten Misty goes missing, her best friend Ellie leaps into action and Operation Find Misty is born. But soon Ellie's detective skills are put to the test. Will Marcie's dreams of an artistic boy help the pair solve the mystery of the lost kitten? Particularly suitable for struggling, reluctant and dyslexic readers aged 8+
author: Cathy Hopkins
